title: Thief : Mast Thief Edition version 1.4 + dlc's repack Mr DJ
description:
LOSSLESS Repack by MR DJ (Me)

Repack features:
- Ripped only languages except English ;
- Final game version (1.4),,fixing several issues and fps + dlc's unlocked ;
- Precracked - install and play;
- Install Time - 25minutes [Quad core]


The following DLCs are unlocked:

* The Bank Heist
* The Predator Booster Pack
* The Opportunist Booster Pack
* The Ghost Booster Pack
* The Moira Asylum Challenge

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

**INSTRUCTIONS:

Disable ur antivirus before running setup (Important) as the antivirus will mark 'setup' as a suspicious file,, making it unable to launch,,same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...

After running setup,, select the necessary software (direct x and visual c++ provided in Redist folder),, install as usual,, Play from desktop(x64 Users)...... 
For people using 32bit os,,open the installed game directory,,open binaries,,den Win32,,den 'Shipping-ThiefGame' to launch the game.....
x64 users should open the Win64 folder....


IF YOU LIKE THE REPACK,,GIVE FEEDBACK AND SEED.......
